chapter.1.quest.3.description.1:
This is my first modpack, and I am not very skilled in making it. If there is any problem, please contact me for modification
My bilibili page：https://space.bilibili.com/55434641
chapter.1.quest.3.task.1.title: Some words
chapter.1.quest.4.description.1: Make this modpack just to have fun, if it suits your appetite, then wish you have fun, if it does not suit your appetite, then please do not force, after all, it is just an integration package, it has an exit option.
chapter.1.quest.4.task.1.title: Other words
chapter.1.quest.5.description.1:
This is a random sky island modpack
Among the two blocks initially generated are empty islands, a 4x4 crying obsidian platform, When the game progresses to a certain level, it will randomly refresh the block in the range of 4x4x4 above the crying Obsidian, and the default time is once every 3 minutes, It is recommended not to place your machine on the crying obsidian, otherwise it will be replaced.


At the same time, when you see the task icon of the pentagon, it means that it is a task that can change the random square


Due to excessive Stage0 items, the Stage0 refresh time was changed to 1.5 minutes
chapter.1.quest.5.task.1.title: start
chapter.1.quest.5.title: start
chapter.1.quest.6.task.1.title: Some items
chapter.1.quest.7.description.1:
1, the game process of the necessary items for the first refresh probability is very large, it is recommended not to miss! 
2, Stage0 oak leaves (actually need saplings), brown mushroom squares (need brown mushrooms), red mushroom squares (need red mushrooms), beacons are required items 
3, Stage1 iron ore (need iron ore itself!!) Is a must
4, Stage2 gold ore (need gold ore itself and crude gold), lapis lazuli ore (need lapis lazuli ore itself), redstone, glowstone are necessary items 




 




 



5. If you really miss the above items, and it is a rare bad luck player in the world, and has not appeared for a long time, you can recover by the following commands (remember to modify the Stage to the stage of the item after entering the instructions) : 
For example: 
</ tag@a remove is_leaves> removes the oak leaf tag, increasing the refresh probability of this item 
</ tag@a remove is_brown_mushroom> Removes the brown mushroom block tag and increases the refresh probability of this item 
<is_leaves> oak leaves 
<is_brown_mushroom> Brown mushroom cube 
<is_red_mushroom> Red mushroom cube 
<is_beacon> beacon 
<is_iron_ore> Iron ore 
<is_gold_ore> gold ore 
<is_lapis_ore>. lapis ore 
<is_redstone_ore> redstone ore 
<is_glowstone> glowstone 
Note: Removing the label only increases the refresh probability of the item and does not guarantee that it will refresh next time

The volcanic sourcelink, when burning the archwood, generates heat, which can convert the stones in the 3x3 range below it into magma block, and convert the magma blocks into lava, which will then generate lava lily on the lava
The netherite blocks are thrown into the lava, which can be converted into water
You ask me how it works? The power of magic

chapter.6.quest.4.description.1:
Iron nugget? Let me grind what? A stone?


 Before iron automation, you had the following sources of iron:
1、pulverizer &2cobblestone&r iron nugget
2、Source Gem block right click 1x gravel &25%&r iron block
3、time remnant crafted iron ingot
4、Random blocks refresh iron block or iron ore


Remember to use accurate collection to reserve at least one raw ore for automation when a random iron ore appears
chapter.6.quest.5.description.1:
Now, sacrifice a magical substance to the world to replace the output of the random cube


At this stage
Remember to use accurate collection to reserve at least one raw ore for automation when a random iron ore appears
(If accurate collection is not available for the time being, iron ore can be transported to other places using MEK cartons for later use)
